SELECT DISTINCT t_driver.driver_id, t_driver.driver_name, t_driver.parent_driver_id AS parent_driver_id, t_driver.driver_address, t_driver.driver_contact, t_parent_driver.driver_name AS parent_driver_name, t_driver.opt_user AS opt_user_id, t_user.user_name AS opt_user_name, t_driver.opt_time FROM base_driver t_driver LEFT JOIN system_users t_user ON t_driver.opt_user = t_user.user_id LEFT JOIN base_driver t_parent_driver ON t_driver.parent_driver_id = t_parent_driver.driver_id WHERE t_driver.parent_driver_id=#{driverId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO base_driver( driver_id, parent_driver_id, driver_name, driver_address, driver_contact, opt_user )VALUES ( #{pojo.driverId}, #{pojo.parentDriverId}, #{pojo.driverName}, #{pojo.driverAddress}, #{pojo.driverContact}, #{pojo.optUser} )
mapper.update: UPDATE base_driver SET parent_driver_id = #{pojo.parentDriverId}, driver_name = #{pojo.driverName}, driver_address = #{pojo.driverAddress}, driver_contact = #{pojo.driverContact}, opt_user = #{pojo.optUser}, opt_time = #{pojo.optTime} WHERE driver_id = #{pojo.driverId}
